legal_editor_text: The website StealthyLabs.eu is edited by StealthyLabs (Digital Content Creator).
legal_cloudflare_desc: This site uses Cloudflare infrastructure to ensure security (DDoS protection), performance, and global content delivery.
legal_privacy_intro: In compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we enforce a strict privacy policy based on data minimization.
legal_privacy_point1_list:
• We collect zero personal data (No names, addresses, phones).
  • We do not log or store your IP address.
  • No advertising trackers or third-party analytics are used.
legal_privacy_point2_desc: We do not use tracking cookies. We only use your browser's 'Local Storage' to save your display preferences (Language and Font). This data remains strictly on your device.
legal_ip_text: All content on StealthyLabs.eu (text, images, logos) is the exclusive property of the editor unless stated otherwise. Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.
legal_links_text: This site contains links to other platforms (YouTube, Twitch, Discord, Amazon, etc.). StealthyLabs is not responsible for the content or privacy policies of these third-party sites.
legal_law_text: Any dispute related to the use of the StealthyLabs.eu website is subject to French law. Exclusive jurisdiction is granted to the competent courts of Paris.
